settings.rev: LEARN MORE

settings.code: COMPANY OVERVIEW

settings.text:
If forced to describe what Recession Proof's Founder and CEO, Marcus Barney has built with his financial literacy mentorship program in one word, it would be DISRUPTIVE. Since 2018, Recession Proof has grown to over 7,000 mentees nationwide and has developed a one-of-a-kind entrepreneurship community that includes millionaire business leaders in industries from tech, stock investments, trucking, real estate and cryptocurrency just to name a few.

At the heart of its' existence, Recession Proof exists to provide knowledge and resources to its' diverse membership population that ranges from ages 15 to 75 and beyond. Through the organization's core values of self-development, collaboration and servitude, Recession Proof has equipped over 500 members to walk away from their jobs and into their destinies to launch 6-figure businesses.
